verses.verse: And it came to pass in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Amraphel <S%H569><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Shinar <S%H8152><s%>, Arioch <S%H746><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Ellasar <S%H495><s%>, K'dorla`omer <S%H3540><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Elam <S%H5867><s%>, and Tidal <S%H8413><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of nations <S%H1471><s%>;

That these made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> with <S%H854><s%> Bera <S%H1298><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%>, and with Birsha <S%H1306><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%>, Shinab <S%H8134><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Admah <S%H126><s%>, and Shemeber <S%H8038><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Zeboiim <S%H6636><s%>, and the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bela <S%H1106><s%>, which is <S%H1931><s%> Zoar <S%H6820><s%>.
All these were joined together <S%H2266><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the vale <S%H6010><s%> of Siddim <S%H7708><s%>, which <S%H1931><s%> is the salt <S%H4417><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>.

Twelve <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8147><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> they served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8804><s%> <S%H853><s%> K'dorla`omer <S%H3540><s%>, and in the thirteenth <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> they rebelled <S%H4775><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And in the fourteenth <S%H6240><s%> <S%H702><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> K'dorla`omer <S%H3540><s%>, and the kings <S%H4428><s%> that were with him, and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the Refa'ims <S%H7497><s%> in Ashteroth Karnaim <S%H6255><s%>, and the Zuzims <S%H2104><s%> in Ham <S%H1990><s%>, and the Emims <S%H368><s%> in Shaveh Kiriathaim <S%H7741><s%>,
And the Horites <S%H2752><s%> in their mount <S%H2042><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%>, unto Elparan <S%H364><s%>, which is by <S%H5921><s%> the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

And they returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Enmishpat <S%H5880><s%>, which is Kadesh <S%H6946><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all the country <S%H7704><s%> of the Amalekites <S%H6003><s%>, and also the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in Hazezontamar <S%H2688><s%>.

And there went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%>, and the king <S%H4428><s%> of Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%>, and the king <S%H4428><s%> of Admah <S%H126><s%>, and the king <S%H4428><s%> of Zeboiim <S%H6636><s%>, and the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bela <S%H1106><s%> (the same <S%H1931><s%> is Zoar <S%H6820><s%>;) and they joined <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8799><s%> battle <S%H4421><s%> with them in the vale <S%H6010><s%> of Siddim <S%H7708><s%>;

With K'dorla`omer <S%H3540><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Elam <S%H5867><s%>, and with Tidal <S%H8413><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of nations <S%H1471><s%>, and Amraphel <S%H569><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Shinar <S%H8152><s%>, and Arioch <S%H746><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Ellasar <S%H495><s%>; four <S%H702><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> with five <S%H2568><s%>.

And the vale <S%H6010><s%> of Siddim <S%H7708><s%> was full of <S%H875><s%> slimepits <S%H875><s%> <S%H2564><s%>; and the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there; and they that remained <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8737><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the mountain <S%H2022><s%>.

And they took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all the goods <S%H7399><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%>, and all their victuals <S%H400><s%>, and went their way <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And they took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Lot <S%H3876><s%>, Abram's <S%H87><s%> brother's <S%H251><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>, who dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in Sodom <S%H5467><s%>, and his goods <S%H7399><s%>, and departed <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And there came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> one that had escaped <S%H6412><s%>, and told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> the Hebrew <S%H5680><s%>; for he dwelt <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the plain <S%H436><s%> of Mamre <S%H4471><s%> the Amorite <S%H567><s%>, brother <S%H251><s%> of Eshcol <S%H812><s%>, and brother <S%H251><s%> of Aner <S%H6063><s%>: and these were confederate <S%H1167><s%> <S%H1285><s%> with Abram <S%H87><s%>.

And when Abram <S%H87><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that his brother <S%H251><s%> was taken captive <S%H7617><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, he armed <S%H7324><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his trained <S%H2593><s%> servants, born <S%H3211><s%> in his own house <S%H1004><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and eighteen <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8083><s%>, and pursued <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them unto Dan <S%H1835><s%>.

And he divided <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8735><s%> himself against them, he and his servants <S%H5650><s%>, by night <S%H3915><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them, and pursued <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them unto Hobah <S%H2327><s%>, which is on the left hand <S%H8040><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%>.

And he brought back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all the goods <S%H7399><s%>, and also brought again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8689><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> Lot <S%H3876><s%>, and his goods <S%H7399><s%>, and the women <S%H802><s%> also, and the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him after <S%H310><s%> his return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from the slaughter <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8687><s%> of K'dorla`omer <S%H3540><s%>, and of the kings <S%H4428><s%> that were with him, at the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Shaveh <S%H7740><s%>, which <S%H1931><s%> is the king's <S%H4428><s%> dale <S%H6010><s%>.

And Malki-TZedek <S%H4442><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Shalem <S%H8004><s%> brought forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and wine <S%H3196><s%>: and he was the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> of Ha `Elyon <S%H5945><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>.

And he blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be Abram <S%H87><s%> of Ha `Elyon <S%H5945><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>, possessor <S%H7069><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%>:

And blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be Ha `Elyon <S%H5945><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>, which hath delivered <S%H4042><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thine enemies <S%H6862><s%> into thy hand <S%H3027><s%>. And he gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him tithes <S%H4643><s%> of all.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Abram <S%H87><s%>, Give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me the persons <S%H5315><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the goods <S%H7399><s%> to thyself.

And Abram <S%H87><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%>, I have lift up <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8689><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, Ha `Elyon <S%H5945><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>, the possessor <S%H7069><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%>,

That I will not <S%H518><s%> take from a thread <S%H2339><s%> even to a shoelatchet <S%H5275><s%> <S%H8288><s%>, and that I will not <S%H518><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any thing that is thine, lest thou shouldest say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I have made <S%H6238><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> rich <S%H6238><s%> <S%H8689><s%>:

Save <S%H1107><s%> only that which <S%H834><s%> the young men <S%H5288><s%> have eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and the portion <S%H2506><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> which went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with <S%H854><s%> me, Aner <S%H6063><s%>, Eshcol <S%H812><s%>, and Mamre <S%H4471><s%>; let them <S%H1992><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their portion <S%H2506><s%>.
